com.communote.common.string

Class StringHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.communote.common.string.StringHelper

  • public final class StringHelper
extends Object
    Helper class for Strings.
    Author:
    Communote GmbH - http://www.communote.com/

    • Method Detail

      • cleanString

        public static String cleanString(String string)
        Cleans a string, removes whitespaces on start and end, and removes multiple whitespaces. Handles null parameter and returns an empty string.
        Parameters:
        string - the string
        Returns:
        the cleaned string

      • cleanStringList

        public static List<String> cleanStringList(List<String> list)
        Cleans a List of Strings, handle null parameter
        Parameters:
        list - the list
        Returns:
        the cleaned list

      • cleanUpString

        public static String cleanUpString(String str,
                                   String cleanUpChar,
                                   String replaceChar)
        Remove the cleanUpChar from the given string by stripping it from the start and end. If it still exists use the replaceChar to remove it. Example: str="%bla%bla", cleanUpChar="%", replaceChar="-" will return "bla-bla"
        Parameters:
        str - the string to cleanup
        cleanUpChar - the string to replace
        replaceChar - the string to replace with
        Returns:
        the cleaned string

      • getStringAsLong

        public static Long getStringAsLong(String value,
                                   Long fallback)
        Converts a string containing a decimal number into a long. If the conversion is not possible the fallback will be returned.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to convert
        fallback - the fallback to return if conversion failed
        Returns:
        the long value

      • getStringAsLongArray

        public static Long[] getStringAsLongArray(String value)
        Gets the string as long array.
        Parameters:
        value - the value
        Returns:
        the string as long array

      • getStringAsLongArray

        public static Long[] getStringAsLongArray(String[] values)
        Parameters:
        values - The values to parse.
        Returns:
        The values as Long array.

      • getStringAsLongList

        public static List<Long> getStringAsLongList(String value)
        Convert a string of longs which are separated by commas into a list of Long objects.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to process
        Returns:
        the list of Longs

      • getStringAsLongList

        public static List<Long> getStringAsLongList(String value,
                                             boolean ignoreValuesEqualLessZero)
        Convert a string of longs which are separated by commas into a list of Long objects.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to process
        ignoreValuesEqualLessZero - if true, parsed long values <= 0 will not be added to the returning list
        Returns:
        the list of Longs

      • getStringAsLongList

        public static List<Long> getStringAsLongList(String value,
                                             String separator)
        Convert a string of longs which are separated by a given string into a list of Long objects.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to process
        separator - the separator
        Returns:
        the list of Longs

      • getStringAsLongList

        public static List<Long> getStringAsLongList(String value,
                                             String separator,
                                             boolean ignoreValuesEqualLessZero)
        Convert a string of longs which are separated by a given string into a list of Long objects.
        Parameters:
        value - the value to process
        separator - the separator
        ignoreValuesEqualLessZero - if true, parsed long values <= 0 will not be added to the returning list
        Returns:
        the list of Longs

      • getStringAsLongList

        public static List<Long> getStringAsLongList(String[] values)
        Parameters:
        values - The values to parse.
        Returns:
        The values as list of Long

      • getStringAsMap

        public static Map<String,String> getStringAsMap(String mapping)
        Converts a string of the form 'k1=v1,k2=v2,k3=v3' into a map with k's as key and the v's as the associated values.
        Parameters:
        mapping - the string based mapping to convert
        Returns:
        the created map

      • replaceCharacter

        public static String replaceCharacter(String source,
                                      char charToReplace,
                                      String replacement)
        Replaces all occurrences of a character with the replacement.
        Parameters:
        source - the source to process
        charToReplace - the character to replace
        replacement - the replacement for the character
        Returns:
        the processed string

      • toString

        public static String toString(Collection<?> coll)
        Build a string containing toString for each sub element. The result will be in the form [a,b,null,c ...]
        Parameters:
        coll - The collection to use
        Returns:
        The String

      • toString

        public static String toString(Map<String,String> mapping)
        Converts the map into a string of the form 'k1=v1,k2=v2,k3=v3'. This method does no escaping, thus keys and values should not contain commas or equal signs. The counterpart of this function is getStringAsMap(String).
        Parameters:
        mapping - the map to convert
        Returns:
        the string

      • toString

        public static String toString(Object[] array,
                              String separator)
        Build a string of the array in the form "o1, o2, o3" if separator is ", "
        Parameters:
        array - an array of objects which should be "stringed"
        separator - the separator to use
        Returns:
        null if array is null otherwise the objects strings separated by the separator

      • truncateMiddle

        public static String truncateMiddle(String string,
                                    int maxLength,
                                    String ellipses)
        To cut out middle part of a String.
        Parameters:
        string - the string to truncate
        maxLength - the max length of a string
        ellipses - the replacement in case of cutting the string
        Returns:
        The abbreviated string if the string exceeds the max length otherwise the original string is returned.
